reviewText: I am a youth director and I use this for our Wednesday night programming.  The DVD portion is 2-4 minutes long so the value there is debateable.  But it has four weeks of lessons, questions and scripture that cover the life of Joseph.  It has worked well for my purposes.  We usually read the main Scripture together, talk about the Bible story and then break into small groups and let me leaders guide the teens through that portion and how it is applicable in their lives.
